oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Climate change and large scale grazing systems and its consequences on habitats of Arctic-alpine plants
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Oksanen, Lauri
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Environmental aspects
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Warming climate threatens to eliminate the habitats of arctic-alpine plants and butterflies dependent on these plants by preparing the ground for the invasion of taller and more competitive plants.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Oksanen, Lauri (2010) Climate change and large scale grazing systems and its consequences on habitats of Arctic-alpine plants. In: Circumpolar agricultural and land use resources - prospects and perspectives for circumpolar productions and industries : abstract booklet, Bioforsk, pp. 10-11.
